channel.description: This is a page to help me stay focused and keep track of what I am doing. It is also to show others what I am currently working on and thinking about. Credit goes to Derrick Sivers for starting a “Now” page movement. Read about “Now” pages here. Updated: 05-19-2024 Career I am currently a Linux Sys Admin. I am studying for Red Hat’s RHCSA exam. My goal is to take the test at the end of September 2024.
